metadata.feature_description: View and manage system-generated URLs with sorting and filtering capabilities

steps.action: Navigated to Content > Pages > URL Test Page > Advanced > S.E.O. tab
steps.expected: URLs for the page should be displayed showing system-generated and custom URLs
steps.actual: URLs were displayed correctly. System-generated URLs are marked as 'Automatic' in the GENERATED BY column. Custom URLs show the creator's username.

steps.action: Verified system-generated URLs on URL Test Page
steps.expected: Multiple system-generated URLs should be visible with status codes
steps.actual: Found 3 system-generated URLs: '/URL-Test-Page' (Active 200), '/URLTestPage' (Redirect 301), '/URL-Test-Page' (Redirect 301) - all marked as 'Automatic'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Sort URLs by different fields (path, locale, status)

steps.action: Attempted to click on URL column header to sort
steps.expected: Column headers should be clickable to sort URLs by path
steps.actual: Column headers (URL, URL Type, Generated By) are not clickable. No sorting functionality is exposed in the UI despite being implemented in the backend code.

issues: Sorting by fields (URL path, locale, status) is implemented in backend code (GetSystemGeneratedUrls with sortField parameter) but not exposed in the UI. Column headers are not clickable.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Sort in ascending and descending order

steps.action: Looked for sort direction controls on URL list
steps.expected: Should be able to toggle between ascending and descending sort order
steps.actual: No sort direction controls or indicators are available in the UI. The backend supports sortOrder parameter (true=ascending, false=descending) but this is not accessible through the UI.

issues: No ascending/descending sort toggle is available in the UI. Backend supports this via sortOrder parameter.

steps.action: Clicked Add URL button and expanded Site Alias dropdown
steps.expected: Should be able to filter URL list by locale
steps.actual: Site Alias dropdown shows locale options (localhost:8081, localhost:8081/ar-er, localhost:8081/de-de, localhost:8081/en-us, localhost:8081/es-ar, localhost:8081/fr-fr) but this is for creating new URLs, not filtering the existing URL list.

issues: Locale information is available in Site Alias dropdown when adding URLs, but there is no filter control to filter the existing URL list by locale.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View URL details including site alias and query strings

steps.action: Clicked Add URL button to view URL details form
steps.expected: URL details form should show Site Alias, URL Path, and status options
steps.actual: URL details form displayed showing: Site Alias (with locale-specific options), URL Path textbox, and URL Type dropdown (Active 200, Redirect 301)

steps.expected: Should show available site aliases with locale information
steps.actual: Dropdown showed all configured site aliases: localhost:8081, localhost:8081/ar-er, localhost:8081/de-de, localhost:8081/en-us, localhost:8081/es-ar, localhost:8081/fr-fr

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify pagination for large URL lists

steps.action: Reviewed URL list display for pagination controls
steps.expected: Pagination controls should be available for navigating large URL lists
steps.actual: No pagination controls are visible in the URL list section. All URLs for a page are displayed in a simple list without pagination.

issues: No pagination controls are available in the UI for URL lists.

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check performance with many system URLs

steps.action: Loaded URL Test Page with 6 URLs (3 system-generated, 3 custom)
steps.expected: URLs should load quickly without performance issues
steps.actual: URLs loaded immediately without any noticeable delay. The page with 6 URLs rendered quickly.

observations: URL Management is accessed per-page via Content > Pages > [Page] > Advanced > S.E.O., not through a separate URL Management section in Site Settings
System-generated URLs are distinguished from custom URLs by the 'GENERATED BY' column showing 'Automatic' instead of a username
The backend code (GetSystemGeneratedUrls) supports sorting by fields (Url=1, Locale=2, Status=3) and sort direction, but this functionality is not exposed in the current UI
Site Alias includes locale information (e.g., localhost:8081/en-us) but there is no dedicated locale filter for the URL list
The UI shows URL path, URL Type (Active 200 / Redirect 301), and Generated By columns for each URL
Custom URLs have edit (pencil) and delete (trash) icons, while system-generated URLs do not have action icons
